sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from '../user'; import { LocalStorageService } from '../shared/local-storage.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-form-page', templateUrl: './form-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./form-page.component.css'] }) export class FormPageComponent { isSuccess = false; survey: User = { name: '', email: '', phone: '', feedback: '', gender: '', age: null, }; constructor(private localStorageService: LocalStorageService) { } submitForm(surveyForm: any) { if (surveyForm.valid) { surveyform console.log('Form Submitted', surveyForm.value); this.localStorageService.put('formData', surveyForm); this.isSuccess = true; surveyForm.reset(); } } }

Survey Form

Name is required.
Name must be at least 3 characters long.
Email is required.
Email must be a valid email address.
Age must be less than 100.
Age must be greater than 18.
Feedback is required.

Thank you!

Your feedback has been submitted successfully.

We will get back to you soon.
